sense.def:
One's face
je prednji del človekove glave od brade do čela.

The face of a mountain
je strmo pobočje gore.

The face of a clock or watch
je površina stenske ali zapestne ure, ki kaže čas.

The face of a place or organization
je zunanjost ali narava kraja ali organizacije;

seg.quote: The face of a city can change completely in a year.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
faces in a particular direction
, ima sprednji del obrnjen v določeno smer.

To face something difficult or unpleasant
ali
to face the truth
pomeni sprejeti nekaj težavnega, neprijetnega ali resničnega, in se soočiti s tem.

seg.quote: It is the biggest problem he has ever faced.
They face a sentence of ten years in prison.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
cannot face something
, se ni sposoben spoprijeti z nečim, ker je videti zelo težavno ali neprijetno.

seg.quote: I just couldn't face the idea of going back there.
She could not face speaking to them.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
face down
, je sprednji del tistega obrnjen navzdol. Kadar je nekaj
face up
, je sprednji del tistega obrnjen navzgor.

cit.quote: z licem navzdol, z licem navzgor

sense.def:
Kadar sta dve osebi
face to face
, gledata naravnost druga v drugo.

seg.quote: I suddenly came face to face with Karen.

sense.def:
To be brought face to face with an unpleasant fact
pomeni, da se ne moremo izogniti neprijetnemu dejstvu in se moramo spoprijeti z njim.

seg.quote: It brings patients face to face with their problems.

sense.def:
To make a face
ali
to pull a face
pomeni nadeti si grd izraz, da bi pokazali, kadar nam nekaj ni všeč.

Kadar človek
loses face
, to pomeni, da ljudje izgubijo spoštovanje do njega.
To save face
pa pomeni nekaj storiti zato, da si ne bi zapravili spoštovanja drugih.

To do something in the face of a particular problem or difficulty
pomeni nekaj storiti kljub temu, da neka težava ali problem obstaja.

seg.quote: They carry on smiling in the face of adversity.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
on the face of it
povemo, da opisujemo, kakšno je nekaj videti, resnična narava tistega pa je morda drugačna.

seg.quote: On the face of it, it sounds like a good idea.

sense.def:
To face up to a difficult situation
pomeni sprejeti težaven položaj in se spoprijeti z njim.

seg.quote: They had to face up to many setbacks.
